Get socials using wallet, talent id or account identifier

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"account_source","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["farcaster","github","wallet"]},"description":"The source of the account"},{"name":"X-API-KEY","in":"header","description":"Your Talent Protocol API key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Get socials using Talent ID","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"socials":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"follower_count":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The count of followers of the profile social"},"following_count":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The count of following of the profile social"},"location":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The location of the profile social"},"owner":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The timestamp of the profile social"},"bio":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The bio of the profile social"},"display_name":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The display name of the profile social"},"image_url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The profile image url of the profile social"},"handle":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The handle of the profile social"},"owned_since":{"type":["string","null"],"format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp of when the social was owned"},"profile_url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The url of the profile social"},"source":{"type":"string","enum":["lens","basename","ens","farcaster","github","linkedin","twitter","efp"],"description":"The source of the profile social"}}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
